# get( integer $mediaId )

Get a list of recent comments on a media object.

public Larabros\Elogram\Http\Response
# create( integer $mediaId, string $text )

Create a comment on a media object using the following rules:

Create a comment on a media object using the following rules:

  • The total length of the comment cannot exceed 300 characters.
  • The comment cannot contain more than 4 hashtags.
  • The comment cannot contain more than 1 URL.
  • The comment cannot consist of all capital letters.

Parameters

$mediaId
The ID of the media object
$text
Text to post as a comment on the media object as specified by $mediaId

Returns

Larabros\Elogram\Http\Response

Link

https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/comments/#post_media_comments
public Larabros\Elogram\Http\Response
# delete( integer $mediaId, string $commentId )

Remove a comment either on the owner of the access token's media object or authored by the owner of the access token.

Remove a comment either on the owner of the access token's media object or authored by the owner of the access token.

Parameters

$mediaId
The ID of the media object
$commentId
The ID of the comment

Returns

Larabros\Elogram\Http\Response

Link

https://www.instagram.com/developer/endpoints/comments/#delete_media_comments
